welcome: 👋 Welcome to your Flipflop Mint Bot
main_menu.title: 📋 Main Menu
main_menu.desc: Use the buttons below to navigate through the available features:
help.text: ℹ️ How to Use Flipflop Mint Bot: 💳 Wallet Management: • Generate Wallets - Create new Solana wallets • My Wallets - View and manage existing wallets 🪙 Token Operations: • Mint Tokens - Create new tokens • Token Data - View detailed token information 💸 Transfer Functions: • Send SOL - Transfer SOL tokens • Send SPL - Transfer SPL tokens 🔧 Other Features: • Refund - Process refund operations • Get URC Info - Retrieve URC-related data • Settings - Configure language and network ⚠️ Safety Reminders: 🔒 Keep your private keys secure 💾 Save wallet files safely 🗑️ Delete sensitive information from chat
generate.select_number: Select the number of wallets to generate:
generate.enter_number: Please enter the number of wallets to generate (1-100):
generate.invalid_number: Invalid number. Please enter a number between 1 and 100.
generate.error: ❌ An error occurred while generating wallets. Please try again.
wallets.fetching: ⏳ Fetching your wallets and balances, please wait...
wallets.none: 🪙 You have not generated any wallets yet. Use "💳 Generate Wallets" to create new wallets
wallets.error_balances: ❌ Error fetching wallet balances. Please try again later
wallets.showing: 📄 Showing {count} of {total} wallets on page {page} of {pages}
wallets.no_tokens: ❌ No SPL tokens found for this wallet.
wallets.not_found_or_removed: ❌ Wallet not found or already removed
wallets.limit_reached: ❌ You have reached the maximum limit of 100 wallets
wallets.confirm_remove_message: Are you sure you want to remove this wallet? {address} ⚠️ Warning: This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have backed up your private key if needed.
sol.select_sender: Select a wallet to SEND SOL:
sol.select_recipient: Select a wallet to RECEIVE SOL:
sol.enter_total: Enter the total amount of SOL to distribute evenly:
sol.enter_amount: Enter the amount of SOL to send (e.g., 0.5, 1, 1.345):
common.invalid_amount: ❌ Invalid amount. Enter a number greater than 0.
spl.select_sender: Select a wallet to distribute SPL tokens:
spl.fetching_tokens: ⏳ Fetching tokens for the selected wallet...
spl.no_tokens_wallet: ❌ This wallet has no SPL tokens. Please select another:
spl.choose_token_or_manual: 🪙 Choose the SPL token contract address or enter it manually:
spl.enter_total: Enter the total amount of SPL tokens to distribute among {count} wallets:
spl.select_recipient: Select a wallet to receive SPL tokens:
spl.enter_amount: Enter the amount of tokens to send:
spl.select_token_prompt: ❌ Please select or enter a valid SPL token address.
send.sol_title: 💸 From the following active wallet, refund SOL and empty the token account, and return the minting fee to this account:
send.spl_title: 🪙 Send SPL Tokens Send SPL tokens from your active wallet to any address:
send.enter_sol_amount: Enter the amount of SOL to send (e.g., 0.1, 0.5, 1.0):
send.enter_spl_amount: Enter the amount of tokens to send:
send.select_token: Select the SPL token to send:
send.invalid_address: ❌ Invalid wallet address. Please enter a valid Solana address.
send.insufficient_balance: ❌ Insufficient balance. Please check your wallet balance.
send.no_tokens: ❌ No SPL tokens found in the selected wallet.
send.confirm_info: Please confirm the above information is correct before clicking the confirm button
send.transaction_submitted: Transaction has been successfully submitted to the blockchain network
send.insufficient_token_balance: ❌ Insufficient token balance. Please check your token balance.
send.no_token_account: ❌ Token account not found in the sender wallet.
send.spl_transfer_error: ❌ SPL token transfer failed, please try again.
send.invalid_token_mint: ❌ Invalid token address. Please enter a valid token contract address.
common.error_try_again: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again.
tx.success_html: 🎉 Transaction Successful! 📄 Tx Hash: {signature} You can verify this transaction on the Solana Explorer
errors.insufficient_funds_sol: ❌ Transaction failed due to insufficient funds in the sender wallet. Please ensure you have enough SOL to cover the transaction amount and fees.
errors.insufficient_funds_spl: ❌ Transaction failed due to insufficient SPL token balance or funds to cover the transfer. Please ensure you have enough tokens and SOL for fees.
mint.title: 🪙 Token Minting Select operation type:
mint.enter_mint_address: Please enter the token contract address:
mint.enter_token_symbol: Please enter the token symbol (e.g., BTC, ETH):
mint.enter_image_url: Please enter the token image URL (optional, send "skip" to skip this step):
mint.enter_batch_count: Please enter the number of times to mint (1-10):
mint.invalid_batch_count: ❌ Invalid number. Please enter a number between 1 and 10.
wallet.no_wallets: ❌ You don't have any wallets yet. Please generate wallets first.
refund.title: 💰 Refund Select refund type:
refund.enter_mint_address: 🪙 SPL Token Refund Please enter the token address (Mint Address) for refund:
refund.invalid_mint_address:
❌ Invalid token address format

Please enter a valid token address (Mint Address):
refund.select_wallet: 💳 Select Refund Wallet 💰 Token Address: {mintAddress} Please select the wallet to receive the refund:
refund.confirm_refund: 🪙 Confirm Refund Information 💰 Token Address: {mintAddress} ⚠️ Notice: • Refund operation is irreversible • Will refund all your investment in this token • May charge certain refund fees • Please ensure your refund wallet balance matches the total minting amount Confirm to proceed with refund?
refund.processing: ⏳ Processing refund... 💰 Token Address: {mintAddress} Please wait, this may take a few seconds...
refund.success: 🎉 Refund Successful! 💰 Token Address: {mintAddress} 📄 Transaction Hash: {signature} 💳 Refund Wallet: {wallet} Refund has been successfully processed, funds will be returned to your wallet.
refund.failed: ❌ Refund Failed Error message: {error} Possible reasons: • Token address does not exist • You have no investment record for this token • Network connection issues • Token does not support refund Please check the token address and try again.
refund.session_expired: ❌ Session has expired, please start over
refund.missing_mint_address: ❌ Token address information lost, please start over
refund.token_not_found:
❌ Token does not exist or unable to get token information

Please check if the token address is correct:
refund.validating_token: 🔍 Validating token... 💰 Token Address: {mintAddress} Checking if token exists...
refund.error: ❌ Refund Operation Failed System encountered an error, please try again later.
refund.cancelled: ❌ Refund Cancelled You have cancelled the refund operation.
refund.network_error: ❌ Network Connection Error Network connection issue occurred. Please check your network connection and try again.
refund.timeout_error: ❌ Operation Timeout Operation timed out. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact support.
refund.insufficient_balance: ❌ Insufficient Balance Wallet balance is insufficient to complete the refund operation. Please check wallet balance.
refund.invalid_transaction: ❌ Invalid Transaction Transaction parameters are invalid. Please try the refund operation again.
errors.spl_program_error: ❌ Transaction failed due to an error in the SPL Token program. Ensure the recipient wallet is valid and the token amount is correct.
settings.menu_title: ⚙️ Settings Please select an option to configure:
mint_data.title: 📊 Token Data View detailed information about any token:
mint_data.enter_mint_address: Please enter the token contract address (Mint Address):
mint_data.fetch_error: ❌ Failed to fetch token data. Please check the address and try again.
mint_data.token_not_found: ❌ Token not found. Please check the address and try again.
send.error_network: ❌ Network error occurred. Please try again later.
mint_data.enter_address: Please enter the token mint address:
mint_data.error_invalid_address: ❌ Invalid token address format. Please enter a valid token address.
mint_data.error_not_found: ❌ Token not found. Please verify the address.
mint_data.error_network: ❌ Network error occurred. Please try again later.
mint_data.not_found: ❌ Token not found. Please verify the mint address.
send.error_blockhash:
❌ Transaction failed: Network congestion, please try again later.

Error details: {error}
send.error_simulation_failed:
❌ Transaction simulation failed, possibly due to network issues or insufficient balance.

Error details: {error}
send.error_general:
❌ Transaction failed: {error}

Please check your network connection and wallet balance before retrying.
send.error_signature_expired: ❌ Transaction signature has expired, please initiate the transaction again
send.insufficient_balance_details: ❌ Insufficient Balance 🏦 Sender Wallet: {senderAddress} 💰 Current Balance: {currentBalance} SOL 📍 Recipient Address: {recipientAddress} 💸 Amount Needed: {amount} SOL ⛽ Estimated Fee: {fee} SOL 📊 Total Required: {totalRequired} SOL Please ensure the selected wallet has enough SOL for the transaction and fees.
get_urc.title: 🔍 Get URC Info
get_urc.description: Get detailed information about a URC (User Referral Code).
get_urc.enter_value: Please enter the URC value to query:
get_urc.invalid_format: ❌ Invalid URC format. Please enter a valid URC.
get_urc.not_found: ❌ URC not found. Please check the URC value and try again.
get_urc.error: ❌ Failed to get URC information. Please try again.
